data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Ghat, Libya that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ghat, Libya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Ghat, Libya know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 38 believers in Ghat to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Father, guide the church in Ghat, Libya to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Cyrenaican people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Ghat, Libya that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Ghat. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Ghat to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Ghat
